snippet: Jacob Marberger, whose disappearance and possible possession of a firearm prompted his college to shut down, died from a self-inflicted gunshot, the police said.
abstract: Jacob Marberger, student missing from Washington College in Maryland, is found dead at Hawk Mountain Sanctuary in Pennsylvania; death is apparent suicide with rifle his parents told police they believed he took with him when he last left home.

byline.contributor: Gary Gately and Richard Pérez-Peña contributed reporting

lead_paragraph: Jacob Marberger, whose disappearance and possible possession of a firearm prompted his college to shut down, died from a self-inflicted gunshot, the police said.

headline.main: Missing Maryland College Student Is Found Dead in Apparent Suicide
headline.print_headline: Missing Maryland Student Found Dead in Pennsylvania
